turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Susan, I have a family event this evening and would like for you to place an order withPizza Emporium please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure Miss Smith. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will need a total of 9 pizzas. I would like 3 cheese, 3 pepperoni, and 3 supreme. ,

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what size should they be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh I apoligize. I would like for all of them to be large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of crust should they have?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mix them up please. Some thin and some pan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Are you sure you don't want your usual gluten free one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please. Make one of the supreme gluten free. Thank you for looking out for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure Miss Smith.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you please ask them to have it ready at 6:00 pm?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I sure will.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please use my usual credit cardinfo to pay for it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will that be the personal or the company card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Personal please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not sure if you are haveing this at your home or somewhere else. Which of their 3 locations will you be picking up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Main St.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok and I will do that right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order has been placed. It will be ready in 25 minutes (6:00) and your receipt will be texted to you
